tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE eco_friendly_vehicles_maintenance_schedule (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    scheduled_maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   vehicle_id INT,
   schedule_date DATE,
   maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
   mechanic_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_record (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   vehicle_id INT,
   maintenance_date DATE,
   maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
   maintenance_description VARCHAR(255),
   cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE EcoFriendlyVehicles (
  vehicle_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
  model VARCHAR(50),
  year INT,
  fuel_type VARCHAR(20),
  maintenance_schedules JSON
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceRecords (
  record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id UUID,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_details JSON
)

CREATE TABLE GarageLocations (
  location_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(100),
  address VARCHAR(255),
  city VARCHAR(50),
  state VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    schedule_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    mechanic_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_record (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    schedule_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_description TEXT,
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE eco_friendly_vehicle (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand VARCHAR(50),
    model VARCHAR(50),
    year INT,
    color VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE fleet_management (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    driver_id INT,
    location VARCHAR(50),
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE eco_vehicles (
  vehicle_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_make VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  vehicle_model VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  production_year INT NOT NULL,
  is_electric BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
  schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id UUID REFERENCES eco_vehicles(vehicle_id),
  maintenance_date DATE NOT NULL,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  maintenance_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_records (
  record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  schedule_id UUID REFERENCES maintenance_schedule(schedule_id),
  maintenance_date DATE NOT NULL,
  maintenance_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
  notes TEXT
);
